about_the_game:
Altidudes is an infinite climber about dudes skateboarding up the tallest mountain in the world, while trying to avoid obstacles and get the highest score!

FEATURES
- A combination of infinite runners and platformers but still not quite able to fit into one genre.
- Beautiful art created pixel by pixel and inspired by your favorite arcade games of yesteryear
- Tubular 8-bit tunes by Bert Cole that will keep you coming back for more!
- Jump, dodge, and slide your way up an impossibly tall mountain
- Unlock and choose from a variety of dudes to play as!
- Beat your high score again and again!
- Play one-handed!


Thanks for checking it out dudes and dudettes!
detailed_description:
Check Out Something Scarier


About the Game

Altidudes is an infinite climber about dudes skateboarding up the tallest mountain in the world, while trying to avoid obstacles and get the highest score!

FEATURES
- A combination of infinite runners and platformers but still not quite able to fit into one genre.
- Beautiful art created pixel by pixel and inspired by your favorite arcade games of yesteryear
- Tubular 8-bit tunes by Bert Cole that will keep you coming back for more!
- Jump, dodge, and slide your way up an impossibly tall mountain
- Unlock and choose from a variety of dudes to play as!
- Beat your high score again and again!
- Play one-handed!


Thanks for checking it out dudes and dudettes!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 8 / Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 32 bit 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Debian / Latest Ubuntu
  • Processor: 64 bit 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 600 series with 2GB memory or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: 64bit 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Altidudes®

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c or OpenGL 2.0 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz dual-core Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 600 series with 2GB memory or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Get your skateboard ready, you are about to climb the tallest mountain in the whole world! With a seemingly infinite height, you can climb as high as you want, but will you ever reach the top?? Pixel graphics! Dude references! Skateboards! A big mountain! We got it all!
